about__intro.message: Help your favorite non-profit by purchasing your Amazon items through AmazonSmile.

about__overviewParagraph.message: This Extension will automatically redirect you to the corresponding AmazonSmile page, so you will never need to remember to go to AmazonSmile first. In order for your non-profit to benefit from your purchase, you must complete your purchase through AmazonSmile.

The extension was not created or endorsed by Amazon.
